title: (Set of 12) 3/4 x 1 Inch (Approx.) Rectangular Flat Head Decorative Iron Nails/Clavos, Natural Black Iron Finish
features: DESIGN: Made from hand forged cast iron, these Rectangular Flat head decorative nails have a natural black finish, complementing any traditional project in your home or office
UTILITY: Ideal for decorating doors, cabinets and other furniture items, but can be used for a variety of purposes
NATURAL BLACK FINISH: These nails have a NATURAL BLACK FINISH, a baked-on finish that is virtually maintenance free and is permanent.
Dimensions - Width: 3/4 inch x Length of Shank: 1 inch
INSTALLATION: Easy to install, simply drill a small pilot hole and tap in with a rubber mallet
description: Decorative Cast Iron Nail ideal for transforming an ordinary door or gate into something with a more authentic appearance
